text: the Fox and the cave once upon a time
there lived a line in the jungle one day
he could not find any food he was very
hungry he was wondering what to do and
what to eat as they were no animal in
the nearby sight there are all the
animals they have they're gone have they
left the jungle he started cursing the
animals he became very dull and felt
very weak while he was wandering here
and then he spotted a cave as soon as he
went near he became sure that some
animal must be living here now he was
happy an idea struck upon him he thought
he'd go inside the cave and hide there
as soon as the animal comes inside he
will kill it and satisfy his hunger
unfortunately for the lion
this cave belonged to a fox which is the
cleverest animal of all so it was not
easy for the line for him when the Fox
returned after hunting his sharp eyes
fell on the footprints of the lion he
observed that the footprints are only
going inside and not coming out he
started thinking of a way to make sure
whether the line is inside or not he got
an idea hello Q how are you
the Fox asked the cave
there was a silence as he did not get a
reply he again asked a cave
what cave what happened
you used to wish me as soon as I
returned is there any problem
when the lion heard this he became
confused he thought that the cave
stopped answering because he is inside
so he started answering back hello you
can come inside there is no problem when
the Fox heard this he became sure that
the line is inside so he ran away as
fast as possible thus the lion could not
get any food and died of hunger modern
if the Fox did not think wisely and
observed keenly he would all fallen as a
prey to the lion
wise people will always be alert use
your brains to escape from any danger
under any circumstance
you
